newsitem.title: FRANCE: One ship loading flour in Rouen, two more due.
newsitem.headline: One ship loading flour in Rouen, two more due.

text.p: One ship is loading 11,000 tonnes of flour at the French port of Rouen, port officials said on Tuesday.
The wheat is for export to Cuba, they said.
Two more ships are expected in port by March 17 to load around 4,000 tonnes of flour.
